CentimetersConversionArea - Class in view
The CentimetersConversionArea is a class in the view package of the system which inputs a value into its text area.

constructor for regular JTextArea

ConverterMenuBar - Class in view
ConverterMenuBar is used as the Invoker in the command pattern and instantiates the menu bar of the interface, inheriting properties from the JMenuBar.
ConverterMenuBar(ActionListener) - Constructor for class view.ConverterMenuBar
Instantiantes Menu and MenuItems Inside this JMenuBar, also invokes command menuBarListener
